name: Kevala Clarified Butter Ghee – Grass‑Fed, Lactose & Casein Free, High Smoke Point Cooking & Baking Butter Alternative – Keto & Gluten Free Spread & Oil Substitute | 2 lb
short_description: [PURE & NATURAL] Made from grass-fed cow’s milk with no additives, preservatives, or artificial ingredients, naturally gluten free and casein free. A clean, wholesome option for those seeking a pure clarified butter for cooking or spreading.

[HIGH SMOKE POINT] Performs exceptionally well at high temperatures, making it ideal for frying, sautéing, roasting, or baking, won’t burn as easily as regular butter, offering greater stability and flavor retention in hot applications.

[KETO & DIET-FRIENDLY] A great fit for keto, paleo, or low-carb diets. Provides a rich, savory flavor and creamy texture as a substitute for butter or lard, supports clean eating and whole-food-based cooking styles without compromise.

[VERSATILE CULINARY USE] Use as a spread on toast, for pan cooking, baking, or as a shortening alternative in recipes, adds a nutty richness and smooth mouthfeel to dishes ranging from sautéed vegetables to baked goods.

[LACTOSE & CASEIN FREE] Crafted to remove milk solids, making it suitable for those with dairy sensitivities, enjoy the flavor and performance of butter without the discomfort, ideal for a wide range of cooking and dietary needs.

name: Kirkland Signature Ghee Clarified Butter, 27 oz
short_description: Premium Clarified Butter Made from pure butter and slowly simmered to remove water and milk solids for a rich, creamy flavor and smooth texture.
456°F High Smoke Point Ideal for sautéing, searing, frying, roasting, and baking — a clean, stable oil that withstands high heat without burning.
Lactose-Free & Casein-Free Naturally clarified to remove lactose and casein, making it gentle on digestion and suitable for dairy-sensitive diets.
Kosher & Gluten-Free Certified kosher and gluten-free for clean and trustable ingredient quality with no preservatives, additives, or artificial flavors.
Versatile Cooking Essential Perfect for Indian cooking, keto diets, Whole30, paleo, bullet coffee, curries, vegetables, meats, rice, and baking recipes.
product_description: Enhance your cooking with Kirkland Signature Ghee Clarified Butter, a premium pantry staple known for its rich aroma, golden color, and smooth, velvety texture. Made by gently simmering pure butter to remove water and milk solids, this ghee offers pure butterfat flavor and exceptional cooking performance. With a high smoke point of 456°F, this clarified butter is perfect for high-heat sautéing, frying, searing, and roasting without burning. Kirkland ghee is naturally lactose-free, casein-free, gluten-free, and kosher, making it suitable for keto, paleo, and Whole30 lifestyles. Use it to elevate curries, stir-fries, vegetables, rice dishes, grilled meats, baked goods, or even blend into coffee for a creamy, energy-rich boost. Experience authentic flavor and premium quality in every spoonful — your everyday cooking just got richer.

name: Premium Gourmet Clarified Butter - Natural & Pure Ghee for Energy, Gut, and Immune Health Support - Versatile Healthy Cooking for Spreading, Baking & Sauteing 2- lbs (32Oz - Natural Ghee)
short_description: About this item About this item About this item ✅ 100% GRASS-FED BUTTER: Experience the rich taste of our premium gourmet ghee, crafted from 100% grass-fed clarified butter, ensuring the highest quality for your health-conscious cooking and baking needs. This gourmet ghee is a lactose-free butter alternative ideal for paleo and Whole30 diets.

✅ EXPERTLY HANDCRAFTED WITH TRADITIONAL TECHNIQUES: Produced using an age-old slow-cooking method, our ghee undergoes careful clarification to separate water and milk solids. This traditional process preserves its golden color, rich aroma, and deep, nutty flavor, making it ideal for enhancing the taste of your favorite dishes.

✅ COMPLETELY LACTOSE AND CASEIN-FREE: Perfect for those with dairy sensitivities, our ghee is entirely free of lactose and casein. It offers a buttery richness without triggering common dairy-related discomfort, making it a safe and delicious option for diverse dietary needs.

✅ BETTER COOKING MEDIUM: Desi Ghee can be used as a healthy replacement to cooking ghee or butter. It’s easy to digest, nurtures digestive health, increases good cholesterol, improves eye health, and has various other health benefits. This Orginal Ghee Clarified Butter is prepared in the best hygienic conditions and comes packed in sustainable and spillage-proof glass bottles.

✅ KETO FRIENDLY GHEE: Ghee is made by simmering raw white butter and reduced until all milk solids separate. It is safe for most people with lactose sensitivity. The ghee is perfect as a butter replacement for a dairy-free diet, enriched with fat-soluble vitamins, making it a healthy butter alternative.
product_description: LOOKING FOR A HEALTHIER, RICHER ALTERNATIVE TO BUTTER? Our Gourmet Ghee is the perfect solution for those who want a flavorful, versatile, and healthier cooking fat. Made from pure ingredients, it's ideal for a variety of uses—whether you're spreading it on toast, cooking meats, or baking. With its rich, buttery taste and added health benefits, it's a kitchen essential for both flavor and well-being. GREAT FLAVOR Enjoy the rich, buttery taste that enhances everything from simple toast to your favorite meat dishes. Health Benefits: A lactose-free, healthier alternative to butter and refined ghee, Halal ingredients support digestion and overall health. Perfect for sautéing, basting, baking, and more. Replace traditional butter and ghee with this multi-functional ghee. NO REFRIGERATION NEEDED Store it easily at room temperature without worrying about spoilage. Smooth Texture: A creamy and spreadable consistency, Heart Original, Kosher, Cultured Sunrise, 4th, A2, Morning Spring, perfect for adding to your favorite recipes. Don’t wait! Add this Gourmet Ghee to your cart today and elevate your cooking. PERFECT FOR HIGH-HEAT COOKING Our ghee is ideal for frying, sautéing, and grilling without breaking down into harmful compounds. Use it to roast vegetables, pan-sear meats, or bake pastries, and enjoy dishes with a smooth, nutty flavor that shines through every bite. DIET-FRIENDLY AND VERSATILE This ghee is a dream ingredient for keto, paleo, and Whole30 diets, offering a clean source of energy with zero carbs. Whether you're following a health-conscious lifestyle or preparing traditional recipes, our cheese adapts effortlessly. It’s also the perfect dairy-free alternative for those with lactose sensitivities.

name: A2 Ghee Butter Organic Grass Fed from Gir Cow | Gut Friendly | Healthy Butter Alternative | Non-GMO, Lactose-Free, Keto Friendly – 2lb from Two Brothers Organic Farms
short_description: Perfect for Thanksgiving Cooking & Baking – Elevate holiday classics like mashed potatoes, roasted veggies, and pie crusts with the rich, nutty flavor of pure ghee. A clean, flavorful alternative to butter for every festive recipe.

CERTIFI100% NATURAL A2 GHEE - A2 Cow Ghee Organic Butter by Two Brothers, sourced from Gir cows that graze freely on lush green pastures, brings you the essence of pure, organic goodness. Crafted using the ancient Bilona method, each batch is meticulously prepared to preserve its natural richness and flavour,use it to replace your regular butter.ED ORGANIC & GRASS-FED - Made from the organic a2 milk of grass-fed Gir cows, ensuring the highest quality and nutritional value. Certified organic by USDA, CCOF, Kosher, and GMP for your peace of mind. Our cows roam freely, feeding on natural grass, resulting in ghee that & free from harmful chemicals and additives.

LACTOSE REDUCED & GLUTEN-FREE - Our ghee is lactose reduced, making it suitable for those with lactose sensitivities or intolerances. Gluten-free, making it a safe choice for individuals following gluten-free diets or with gluten sensitivities.

KETO & PALEO Ally - Looking for a lactose-free source of healthy fats? Two Brothers Organic Farms Grass-Fed organic a2 gir cow ghee, is Keto and Paleo-friendly, making it a perfect addition to your diet.

Unique Properties - Gir cows have a hump - Surya Ketu Nadi that contains the Surya Ketu Nadi. When this hump is exposed to direct sunlight, it releases gold salts into the cow’s milk. These salts give the milk a natural golden color and enhance its nutritional content. As a result, Gir cow a2-ghee is more nutritious than ghee from other breeds.

UNSALTED & PURE - We keep our ghee unsalted, allowing you to enjoy its natural taste and aroma without any added sodium. Pure and unadulterated, our ghee is free from artificial flavors, colors, or preservatives.
Indulge in the richness of our A2 Cow Ghee, Clarified Butter for cooking, a wholesome addition to your kitchen essentials for a healthier lifestyle.
EASY TO CARRY- This travel-friendly, sustainable bottle contains aroma-rich ghee made from grass-fed cow’s milk, ensuring you enjoy the pure taste of nature on the go.

product_description: Organic Valley Organic Ghee Clarified Butter is versatile, with a rich, nutty flavor. This organic clarified butter is lactose free and casein free. With a high smoke point, ghee is a great cooking butter over high heat, including sautéing, frying, roasting and baking. Substitute ghee for oil or organic butter in your favorite recipes, spread it on bread, drizzle it over popcorn, or try adding it to your morning coffee. We slowly simmer our ghee butter to coax the excess water out while preserving the nutritional benefits of pasture raised butter. In the process, some of the ghee’s milk solids caramelize, leaving behind hints of sweetness and roasted nuts. Organic Valley ghee comes in a resealable, shelf stable container for easy storage.

short_description: 100% Pure, Fresh and Original: Spice Outlet takes great care in the ingredient selection and preparation method. We are committed to making ghee of uncompromising quality. Spice Outlet Grass fed Ghee is made using old fashion home slow cooked recipe style.
Healthy Home Made Ghee : Our Healthy Desi Original Ghee helps reduce cholesterol, improves the heart's functioning and reduces joint pain.It keeps the body healthy and increases its potency.
USE FOR COOKING : Ghee is a premium cooking oil celebrated for its taste, nutritional benefits, and medicinal qualities. Add spices to ghee when cooking to carry the flavor deep into the food.
UP TO 450 °F SMOKE POINT- This means our Original ghee is perfect for cooking, sauteing, and baking because it burns at a higher temperature than other cooking oils.
PLEASE NOTE: Ghee may liquefy during shipping, but will re-solidify within a few hours of refrigeration, or overnight at room temperature.
It comes in a 16oz plastic jar, so no worries about damage during transit.
Make Bulletproof Coffee using our Ghee. Bulletproof Coffee is a science-based approach to nutrition and wellness that is tried, tested, and proven to make life more awesome.
product_description: Ghee Clarified Butter : To make the best ghee is to offer love. In the natural tradition, our pure organic ghee is the symbol and food of long lasting life and vibrant health. It is used not just as a food, but as a medicine. Ghee nourishes and enriches life, on all levels. Physical, emotional, mental, and spiritual. Ghee is a clean and versatile butter oil for all of your culinary needs. It’s made by cooking down butter to remove the water and milk solids (“clarifying”), a process which leaves it lactose- and casein-free. This same purifying process gives ghee its remarkably high smoke point up to 450 °F, which means that it doesn’t burn or chemically alter at high heats, so it’s great for frying and sautéing. Its also equally delicious on toast, in coffee, drizzled on popcorn, or even enjoyed on its own.
